JobFullDesc: Raytheon Technologies seeks an experienced Mechanical Engineer to provide top-quality products for the nation’s defense, in a cooperative and collaborative work environment. The qualified candidate will provide mechanical engineering support for the Common Engineering Department in support of the McKinney Consolidated Manufacturing Center.  The primary focus will be on the design of Special Tooling and secondarily to support Test Equipment for electro-mechanical/electro-optical systems.  You will be responsible for new tooling product designs and implementation into the factory as well as improvements to existing products.  The candidate will utilize their mechanical engineering expertise during design, development, and integration to create solutions that meet product requirements and incorporate robust design principles.  The candidate will provide leadership on processing, tracking and procuring special tools while also supporting mechanical issues to the project team, working closely with functional engineers to provide a complete system solution to the customer.  Security Clearance: The ability to obtain and maintain a US security clearance.
